name: Mans Best Friend (ComLarsic)
description:
A rogue-like game about a man and his dog exploring a dungeon.
The dog has magical abilities that can increase your strength when you are near him.

This game can be played alone or with a friend

Controls:

-- Human --

WASD / Left stick - Move
Shift / LT - Sprint

Mouse Look / Right Stick -
Aim slash attack
Click1 / RT - Attack

-- Dog --
IJKL / Arrows / Left stick - Move

; / KP ENTER / LT - sprint

U / KP DEL / RT - Attack
O / KP 0 / Y - Shoot
